My dad always told me stories,...
...about a hidden world where brave warriors watch over and protect us.
..."Just because you haven't seen something, doesn't mean it's not there".
I am going to destroy the forest.
But I'm only going to do it once so try to pay attention.
Come on, you're with us now.
Dad, I had the most messed up dream.
There were talking slugs and tiny, little soldiers.
